evidence.claim: GlobalPro's APIs are hosted on AWS cloud infrastructure.
The company ensures compliance with HIPAA regulations in their health tech solutions.
Integration with EHRs using HL7 and FHIR standards is a key feature of GlobalPro's offerings.
GlobalPro supports transaction sets compliant with X12 standards for healthcare.

icp.icp_reason: GlobalPro focuses on HIPAA-compliant data exchange with EDI transactions.
